sentences.en: At best , they are likely to flatten off over the coming years.
sentences.cn: 所幸的是,这一现象将在将来几年内被熨平.

sentences.en: Creases are what I want, But now you flatten it.
sentences.cn: 我要的就是折纹, 但你现在却给它熨平了.

sentences.en: Double round flatten and two - seater pairs of power polishing machine one.
sentences.cn: 双轮压平及 双座 双动力抛光机1台.

sentences.en: Flatten the dough with a press of the hand.
he flattened out and made a fine three-point landing.
sentences.cn: 他把飞机改平后，来了一个精确的三点着陆。

sentences.en: If it lumpy, you can use the flatten brush to smooth along the folds.
sentences.cn: 如果它出现大的起伏, 你可以用flatten笔刷沿着褶皱去光滑下.

sentences.en: In the squash court his chief aim is to flatten me.
sentences.cn: 在壁球场上他的主要目标就是击败我。

sentences.en: Lightly press with hazelnuts or cashew nuts to flatten the cookies.
sentences.cn: 用榛子或腰果轻轻压平饼干.

sentences.en: Peel off the blackened skin, flatten the pepper out and trim it into edible pieces.
sentences.cn: 把发黑的皮削掉，把甜椒压扁，切成可以入口的小块。

sentences.en: She used a rolling pin to flatten the pie dough.
sentences.cn: 她用擀面棍来擀平做馅饼的面团.

sentences.en: The cookies will flatten slightly while cooking.
The eyelids continue to and the mouth continues to flatten.
sentences.cn: 眼皮继续闭紧嘴巴继续平展.

sentences.en: The land flattened out as we neared the coast.
sentences.cn: 我们接近海岸时，地势变平坦了。

sentences.en: The table was to small to flatten out the entire map.
sentences.cn: 桌子太小而无法让整张地图平放.

sentences.en: Use a rolling pin to flatten the dough.
We can flatten out a piece of metal by hammering it.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用锤子把一块金属敲平.
我们以6比0彻底击败了他们。

sentences.en: We now think prices will flatten out towards the end of this year.
sentences.cn: 我们现在认为到今年年底价格会趋于平稳。

sentences.en: Wrinkled silk will flatten out again if you iron it.
sentences.cn: 变皱了的绸子,如果经过熨烫可以再变平.

words.tran_cn: 平坦的；扁平的；浅的；单调的
断然地；平平地；直截了当地

trans.tran_en: to make something flat or flatter, or to become flat or flatter

trans.tran_cn: 变平，使（某物）变平，打倒，击倒，使失去光泽
